entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable "Implement abstract class" for VB when inheriting from C# abstract record #57510
  • Source generator server cache should consider MetadataReferences #57503
    17.1
  • Renaming class "Program" does not work and behaves weirdly in file with top-level statements #57495
  • Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.InvocationExpressionSyntax' to type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.TypeSyntax' #57494
  • Documentation recommends inefficient way to read file. #57492
  • Roslyn fails to verify [NotNullIfNotNull] annotations in lambda expression to delegate conversions #57491

Closed

  • VS Quick Info code sample formatting not preserved #57262
    17.1
  • False positive with nested functions: warning CS0162: Unreachable code detected #51010
    Compiler.Next
  • Method group is not classified as "method name" when assigned to Delegate #57184
    17.1
  • Suggested change would break code #57472

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache the stale syntax-indices we load prior to OOP being fully hydrated. #57514
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure only one storage service factory gets created per workspace. #57513
    Area-IDE
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57512
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid recomputing expensive persistence location data that does not change. #57511
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized missing warning message #57296 #57502
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57499
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Minor updates to "Using additional files" docs #57493
    Area-Analyzers, Community

Merged

  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #57509
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Options Refactoring - Round 3 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Run net6.0-windows unit tests in CI #57480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 'simplify conditional expression' with VB value equality #57487
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not normalize leading whitespace in code comments #57414
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57497
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reference VS Debugger.Contracts in DebuggerContractVersionCheck #57479
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57501
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix inline diagnostics location issue in VB #57473
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Classify method group assignments as methods #57410
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Compilers
  • Upgrade xunit to get newer asserts #57398
    Area-Compilers
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
